text:
Hey, Hiori,
how's it going with the unit activities?

...Nothing's really changed.
I just focus on doing what I need to do.

I see...
Do you think you'll get along with Mano and Meguru?

...Honestly, I'm not sure.
I don't even know what to talk to them about.

Hmm... Well, how about discussing what you've noticed
during rehearsals? You're all working towards the same goal, after all.

...Yeah, that's true.
I'm not sure if I'll do well, though.
Well, let's give it a try without overthinking it. You'll be fine, Kazano.

...Even though there's no basis for it,
why do you say that so easily?

...Sorry for being rude even after
receiving your advice.

No, I'm the one who should apologize...! You're right,
there's no guarantee that things will go perfectly.

But if you think it won't work from the start,
you won't have the power to shine, right?

! ...Yeah, you're right.
I need to be careful not to overthink things.
